short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides additional functionality for video players played in the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides additional functionality for video players played in the web.

You can check all supported functionality here: https://github.com/walidghallab/video-experience-enhancer/tree/latest#supported-functionality

The popup (when you click on the extension icon) will always show the supported functionality for the current tab.

The code is publicly available on github: 
https://github.com/walidghallab/video-experience-enhancer 

If you have any feature requests or ideas for improving the extension and adding any new functionality, please follow instructions here to submit a feature request:
https://github.com/walidghallab/video-experience-enhancer/issues
